FuncDef:
The arp proxy intra-vlan enable command enables intra-VLAN proxy ARP.
The undo arp proxy intra-vlan enable command disables intra-VLAN proxy ARP. The arp proxy intra-vlan enable command enables intra-VLAN proxy ARP. The undo arp proxy intra-vlan enable command disables intra-VLAN proxy ARP. By default, intra-VLAN proxy ARP is disabled.
ParentView: 100ge sub-interface view,10GE sub-interface view,1200ge sub-interface view,200GE sub-interface view,25GE sub-interface view,400GE sub-interface view,50GE sub-interface view,Eth-Trunk sub-interface view,VLANIF interface view,Interface group view
ExtraInfo: If two hosts are within the same isolate-user-VLAN, communication between them on the Layer 2 network cannot be implemented. In this case, run the arp proxy intra-vlan enable command on the associated VLAN interface to enable intra-VLAN proxy ARP. This configuration implements communication between the hosts within an isolate-user-VLAN.
